text: |Intrusive elements||Elements that are harmful for a designated view, for example through obscuring a landmark or protected skyline, or adversely affecting the prominence of a landmark by scale and/or proximity, including through coalescence and visual dominance.| |Intermediate housing||Homes for sale and rent provided at a cost above social rent. but below market levels subject to the criteria in the affordable housing definition. These can include shared equity (shared ownership and equity loans), other low cost homes for sale and intermediate rent.|
